ygData.subject: RE: Is eq sexual harrasment racist?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, Sorry Halana, when i said that the barbarian shamans were SOB s i ment the males i ve met.  Not many female shamans, i tip my hat.  I have a level 50
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, Sorry Halana, when i said that the barbarian shamans were SOB's i ment
the males i've met. Not many female shamans, i tip my hat. I have a level
50 shaman troll friend, your class has the greatest buffs

Minkin
Sol Ro
Level 35 Bard

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [SMTP:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: October 8, 1999 5:48 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Is eq sexual harrasment racist?
>
> From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> AH! Minkin! What blasphemy! Well, sometime you'll have to
> meet Halana, she is a very kind Shaman I assure you. :-) I don't know
> what
> level you are, but she is 31 now, so if you'd ever like to fight together
> give me a tell. Course she's going to be camping rubi for the next couple
> days in a desperate attempt to get some hot red pants while they can still
> be had.
>
> Tani 15th Bard
> Halana 31st Shaman
> Solusek Ro
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: CYR, Thierry [mailto:tcyr@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 3:15 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Is eq sexual
> harrasment racist?
>
> From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>
>
> i've found that most of the attitude problem
> players are either wizards or
> druids.... being kill stealers or/and
> kiters. And my personnal favorite top
> hated is Barbarian shamans, i've only met
> one nice one of them so far. And
> i agree, when i had my newbie troll i found
> that most of the trolls and
> ogres i met were very friendly, then again,
> most newbies are as they havent
> been exposed to kill stealing dungeons yet
> where they lose their innocence.
>
> Minkin
> Sol Ro
>
> > sage-----
> > From: Renee Cole
> [SMTP:nat_ive@...]
> > Sent: October 8, 1999 4:24 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Is eq sexual
> harrasment racist?
> >
> > From: "Renee Cole" <nat_ive@...>
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > >OK time for a new wrinkle on the stalker
> issue, have any of you who play
> > >female characters noticed a trend in the
> race of the stalkers?
> >
> >
> > Can't say as I've ever had much of a
> problem with stalkers. Had one high
> > elf try it once with my wood elf druid. I
> sent him a tell that if he
> > didnt
> > stop it ASAP, i would /report him. He
> apologized quickly and never I
> > heard
> > from him again. I am female in RL, btw.
> >
> > Never had the problem on my wood elf bard
> from strangers. Get lots of
> > teasing from flirting from the male
> members of my guild. But since I've
> > known most of them for 3 RL years, its not
> quite the same thing.
> >
> > One thing I have noticed: for some reason,
> seems like more wood elves and
> > high elves have attitude problems than the
> other races. Wood elf male
> > bards
> > being the worst. Of course, this is a
> subjective opinion. One thing for
> > sure though, soon as my wood elf
> characters were old enough to travel, I
> > left Fedwyr and rarely go back.
> >
> > As for Trolls and Ogres, I've found them
> to be some of the nicest folks
> > you'd want to be around, so long as you
> can overlook their disgusting
> > personal habits ;-P
> >
> > -Treehugger and Songmaker
> >
> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards
> newsletter to toren@...
> > with the subject lol.
